HomeFeatures

Signal Features

Innovative technology for sign language interpretation

1

ASL Finger Spelling Detection

Advanced detection of one-handed American Sign Language finger spelling using sensor data from a specialized glove.

2

Sensor Visualization

Real-time visualization of flex sensors and gyroscope data, allowing users to see how the system interprets their movements.

3

Gemini AI Integration

Integration with Google's Vertex AI Gemini for accurate and fast interpretation of sign language gestures and patterns.

4

Modern UI

Clean, intuitive interface built with Material Design 3 and Jetpack Compose, providing an excellent user experience.

5

Hardware Concept

Innovative hardware design includes 5 flex sensors (one for each finger), GY-91 MPU9050 module for orientation detection, microcontroller, and Bluetooth module.

6

Future Development

Planned features include expanded sign language vocabulary, real-time translation, and community features for sharing and improving detection.

Technology Stack

  • Android Development

    Kotlin + Jetpack Compose

  • AI Integration

    Google Vertex AI Gemini API + Gemma

  • UI Framework

    Material Design 3

  • Architecture

    MVVM (Model-View-ViewModel)

Ready to experience Signal?

Join us in our mission to make sign language interpretation accessible to everyone.
